function NPC_7512001:Init( NPCID ) --[[ USERDATA 1 : 파츠파괴 데미지 누적 2 : Pain 데미지 누적 3 : Pain 모드전환 데미지 누적 4 : 광폭모드 제어 변수( 러쉬 스킬 사용중 광폭화 시간이 다되면 이 변수가 1이 된다. 러쉬 종료후 이 변수를 체크하여 지침으로 이어질지 광폭화를 유지할지 체크) --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 5 )
NPC_7512001.UD_HitBPartsWeapon = 5
local MaxHP = NPC_7512001.MaxHP
NPC_7512001.LimitForPain = MaxHP/20 NPC_7512001.LimitForBreakSword = MaxHP/80 NPC_7512001.LimitForModeChange = MaxHP/20
NPC_7512001.DamageBonusForBreakSword = MaxHP/6
NPC_7512001.TalIdPain1 = 251200101 NPC_7512001.TalIdPain2 = 251200102 NPC_7512001.TalIdTire1 = 251200107 -- mode0 NPC_7512001.TalIdTire2 = 251200108 -- mode0 NPC_7512001.TalIdTire3 = 251200140 NPC_7512001.TalIdTire4 = 251200141 NPC_7512001.TalIdBerserk = 251200109 NPC_7512001.TalIdChangeMode0 = 251200151
NPC_7512001.TalIdRushCancel1 = 251200120 NPC_7512001.TalIdRushCancel2 = 251200130
NPC_7512001.BuffIdBerserk = 40500 NPC_7512001.BuffIdPoint = 40501 NPC_7512001.DurTimeOfBerserk = 30
NPC_7512001.TalIdBPartAttack = 192020 NPC_7512001.TalIdBPartReaction1 = 251200101 -- 일반모드일 경우 Reaction NPC_7512001.TalIdBPartReaction2 = 251200152 -- 광폭화 모드일 경우 Reaction end
function NPC_7512001:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 4 do this:SetUserData( i, 0 ) end -- for end
-- 더 파괴할 파트가 있는지 체크하는 함수 function NPC_7512001:SwordExist( ThisNPC ) return not( ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) and ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 2 ) and ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 3 ) ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnStartPoint1( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "lock", 0 ) --Enemy:GainBuff( NPC_7512001.BuffIdPoint ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnStartPoint2( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "lock", 0 ) --Enemy:GainBuff( NPC_7512001.BuffIdPoint ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnFinishRushCancel( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnFinishRushCancel\n" )
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnCancelRushAttack1( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnCancelRushAttack1\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
if ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7512001.UD_HitBPartsWeapon ) == 1 then return end
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdRushCancel1 ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnCancelRushAttack2( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnCancelRushAttack2\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
if ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7512001.UD_HitBPartsWeapon ) == 1 then return end
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdRushCancel2 ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnFinishRushAttack( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnFinishRushAttack\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
if ThisNPC:GetUserData(4) == 1 then NPC_7512001:TiredReaction( ThisNPC ) end
ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
-- -- 리비우트가 지치는 모션취하도록 하는 함수. -- 칼이 있거나 없을경우, 체력이 30% 이상 또는 미만일 경우에 따라서 다른 탤런트를 사용하여야 한다. -- function NPC_7512001:TiredReaction( ThisNPC ) -- GLog( "NPC_7512001:TiredReaction\n" )
if NPC_7512001:SwordExist( ThisNPC ) then if ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() > 0.3 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdTire1 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdTire3 ) end else if ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() > 0.3 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdTire2 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdTire4 ) end end end
function NPC_512001:OnFinishBPartReaction( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_512001.UD_HitBPartsWeapon, 0 ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnTimer( Index ) --GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnTimer\n")
if Index == 1 then
if not this:IsNowCombat() then return end
if this:GetMode() ~= 3 then this:SetUserData( 4, 1 ) return end
NPC_7512001:TiredReaction( this ) end end
function NPC_7512001:OnFinishRushMode( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_7512001.BuffIdBerserk ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end
-- 전투 종료처리 function NPC_7512001:OnCombatEnd( ) -- GLog( "OnCombatEnd" ) this:RemoveBuff( NPC_7512001.BuffIdBerserk ) this:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnStartTiredToPeace( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnStartTiredToPeace\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_7512001.BuffIdBerserk ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
-- 체력 30% 이하에서 지침모드가 시작될때 호출. -- 주기적으로 지침모드에 돌입하기 위해서 타이머를 설정한다. function NPC_7512001:OnStartTiredToBerserk( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnStartTiredToBerserk\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( 1, NPC_7512001.DurTimeOfBerserk + 5, false ) -- 지침애니메이션의 자체 길이 때문에 +5를 해준다.
--GLog( "NPC_7512001:SetTimer " .. NPC_7512001.DurTimeOfBerserk + 5 .. "\n" )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
-- 광폭화 전환 탤런트가 종료될때 처리 -- 광폭화 종료타이밍을 SetTimer로 설정한다. function NPC_7512001:OnFinishBerserk( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_7512001:OnFinishBerserk\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:SetTimer( 1, NPC_7512001.DurTimeOfBerserk, false ) --GLog( "NPC_7512001:SetTimer " .. NPC_7512001.DurTimeOfBerserk .. "\n" )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2 , 0 ) end
-- 다음번에 파괴해야될 파트의 인덱스를 알려주는 함수 function NPC_7512001:GetNextPartIndex( ThisNPC ) --GLog( "NPC_7512001:GetNextPartIndex\n" )
local PartIdx = 0 if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 2 ) then if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 3 ) then PartIdx = 3 end else PartIdx = 2 end else PartIdx = 1 end
return PartIdx end
function NPC_7512001:AccDamageForBPartsWeapon( ThisNPC, HitIndex, HitInfo ) -- GLog( HitInfo.TalentID ) if HitInfo.TalentID == NPC_7512001.TalIdBPartAttack then return true end return false end
function NPC_7512001:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitIndex, HitInfo ) -- GLog( "NPC_7512001:AccDamage : HitIndex=" .. HitIndex .. ",1:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) .. ",2:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. ",3:".. ThisNPC:GetUserData(3) .. "\n" )
if NPC_7512001:AccDamageForBPartsWeapon( ThisNPC, HitIndex, HitInfo ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_512001.UD_HitBPartsWeapon, 1 )
if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdBPartReaction1 ) else -- 광폭화 또는 러쉬 모드일경우는 광폭화 모드상태의 pain을 수행 ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdBPartReaction2 ) end
HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage + NPC_7512001.DamageBonusForBreakSword return HitInfo end
-- Acc for pain local DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, DmgAcc )
if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, DmgAcc ) end
-- Acc for break parts if HitIndex == 1 and HitInfo.Attacker:IsRear( ThisNPC ) then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, DmgAcc ) end
-- TiredMode 처리. if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_7512001.TalIdTire1 or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_7512001.TalIdTire3 then
-- 임계 데미지를 넘지 않았다면 무시 if ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) < NPC_7512001.LimitForBreakSword then return HitInfo end
-- 칼부위 파괴 처리 local PartIdx = NPC_7512001:GetNextPartIndex( ThisNPC )
if PartIdx > 0 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdPain2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( PartIdx, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1 , 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2 , 0 )
HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage + NPC_7512001.DamageBonusForBreakSword end
return HitInfo end
if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 and ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) > NPC_7512001.LimitForPain then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7512001.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2 , 0 ) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_7512001:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_7512001:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_7512001:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) return NPC_7512001:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnHitCapsule_2_2(HitInfo) return NPC_7512001:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnHitCapsule_2_3(HitInfo) return NPC_7512001:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) return NPC_7512001:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7512001:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) return NPC_7512001:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
